tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE recipe (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255), cook_time INT, cook_temperature INT);
CREATE TABLE ingredient (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_id INT, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255), quantity DECIMAL(10,2));

CREATE TABLE cooking_session (
    session_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    recipe_id INT,
    cooking_start_time TIMESTAMP,
    cooking_end_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES recipe(recipe_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Recipe (recipe_id INT PRIMARY KEY, recipe_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, cooking_time INT NOT NULL, cooking_temperature INT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Ingredient (ingredient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, ingredient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, amount INT NOT NULL, units VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE RecipeIngredients (recipe_id INT, ingredient_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipe(recipe_id), FOREIGN KEY (ingredient_id) REFERENCES Ingredient(ingredient_id));
CREATE TABLE Cook (cook_id INT PRIMARY KEY, cook_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, experience_level VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE CookedRecipes (cook_id INT, recipe_id INT, date_cooked DATE NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (cook_id) REFERENCES Cook(cook_id), FOREIGN KEY (recipe_id) REFERENCES Recipe(recipe_id));
